text: @marklevinshow Is this a joke? You can read the prescription that it is for malaria to take before world travel. Something which people have used this drug for decades. Another note: 11 years ago, COVID-19 didn’t exist in humans, so I seriously doubt Obama was taking it for no virus. 🙄
